name: Task Completion Quality Check
description: When a task is complete, run cargo clippy, cargo fmt and tests to ensure all is passing

actions.request:
Run the following quality checks in sequence:
1. Run `cargo fmt -- --check` to check code formatting
2. Run `cargo clippy --all-features --all-targets -- -D warnings` to check for clippy warnings
3. Run `cargo test --all-features` to run all tests

Ensure all commands pass successfully. If any fail, report the issues and suggest fixes.
